mapper.select: select a.id, a.shift_name, a.class_name, a.coke_oven_number, a.carbonization_chamber_number, case when ISNULL(a.production_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.production_date, '%Y-%m-%d') end as production_date, case when ISNULL(a.planning_production_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.planning_production_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as planning_production_time, case when ISNULL(a.actual_production_time) then '' else concat(DATE_FORMAT(a.production_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ', DATE_FORMAT(a.actual_production_time, '%H:%i:%s')) end as actual_production_time, a.coke_current, a.coke_type, a.planning_run_cycle, a.actual_run_cycle, a.single_hole_production, case when ISNULL(b.planning_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(b.planning_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as planning_load_coal_time, case when ISNULL(b.actual_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(b.actual_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as actual_load_coal_time, b.coal_current, b.Loading_coal as loading_coal, a.materials_name, b.coal_tower_number, case when ISNULL(c.planning_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(c.planning_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as next_planning_load_coal_time, case when ISNULL(c.actual_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(c.actual_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as next_actual_load_coal_time, c.coal_current as next_coal_current, c.Loading_coal as next_loading_coal, c.coal_tower_number as next_coal_tower_number, case when ISNULL(a.actual_production_end_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.actual_production_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as actual_production_end_time from t_production_output_performance_manual_bake a INNER JOIN t_production_output_performance_manual_coal b ON a.coal_record_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_production_output_performance_manual_coal c ON a.next_coal_record_id = c.id where (#{condition.shiftName} = '' or a.shift_name = #{condition.shiftName}) and (#{condition.className} = '' or a.class_name = #{condition.className}) and (#{condition.cokeOvenNumber} = 0 or a.coke_oven_number = #{condition.cokeOvenNumber}) and (#{condition.carbonizationChamberNumber} = 0 or a.carbonization_chamber_number = #{condition.carbonizationChamberNumber}) and (#{condition.startDate} = '' or a.production_date >= case when #{condition.startDate} = '' then null else #{condition.startDate} end) and (#{condition.endDate} = '' or a.production_date <= case when #{condition.endDate} = '' then null else #{condition.endDate} end) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}

select a.coal_level_materials_code as coke_level_materials_code,e.materials_name as coke_level_materials_name,c.plan_number,a.id,d.start_time as coal_detail_start_time from t_production_configure_coal_species_performance a INNER JOIN t_production_configure_coal_species_performance_detail d ON a.id = d.main_id INNER JOIN ( select max(b.start_time) as start_time from t_production_configure_coal_species_performance a INNER JOIN t_production_configure_coal_species_performance_detail b ON a.id = b.main_id, (select convert(dict_value,SIGNED) as dict_value from t_sys_dict_data where dict_label='倒推时间') as b where b.start_time <= date_add(STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{productionDate},' ',#{actualProductionTime}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval -1 * b.dict_value hour) ) as b ON d.start_time = b.start_time INNER JOIN t_production_plan_config_coke c ON a.plan_id = c.id and c.plan_state != 1 INNER JOIN t_materials_code e ON a.coal_level_materials_code = e.materials_code and e.delete_flag = 0 group by a.coal_level_materials_code,e.materials_name,c.plan_number,a.id,d.start_time
